column3: Traffic;PHNOM PENH: A------ Chinese man in a Rav4 hit a truck carrying sand at 10.45 am on 20 October 2019
column4: along National Road 3 in Prey Pring Tbong village
column10: driven by an unnamed Chinese driver
column11: was traveling north to south on the wrong side of the road
column12: when it plowed head on into a truck
column14: traveling in the opposite direction.------After the incident
column15: the police took both vehicles away to await a legal solution. ------POST NEWS
